properties.areaDesc: Dillon, SC; Bladen, NC; Columbus, NC; Florence, SC; Robeson, NC; Marion, SC; Darlington, SC; Marlboro, SC
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 13 at 3:16PM EST until January 13 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina...
Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina...
Northwestern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina...
Northwestern Florence County in northeastern South Carolina...
Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina...
Central Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina...
Northwestern Marion County in northeastern South Carolina...
Southeastern Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina...

* Until 615 PM EST.

* At 315 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding in
the advisory area.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Florence, Lumberton, Marion, Dillon, Darlington, Elizabethtown, Red
Springs, Pembroke, Fairmont, Timmonsville, St. Pauls, Bladenboro,
Latta, Rowland, Lamar, Quinby, Lake View, Clio, Sellers and
Boardman.
properties.instruction:
Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small
creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as
well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.

A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding
of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
